o2Level.desc: The SO2 value is defined as the extent to which oxygen saturates the hemoglobin molecules in the RBC's. At full saturation the normal SO2 is 95% to 100%
o2Level.title: Oxygen Rate

respiratoryRate.desc: The respiration rate is the number of breaths a person takes per minute. Respiration rates may increase with fever, illness, and other medical conditions.
respiratoryRate.title: Respiratory Rate

heartBeat.desc: A normal resting heart rate for adults ranges from 60 to 100 beats per minute. A lower heart rate at rest implies more efficient heart function and better cardiovascular fitness.
heartBeat.title: Heart Rate

sdnnRange.desc: It describes the standard deviation for the time elapsed between successive heartbeat peaks. Below 50 ms are classified as unhealthy, 50–100 ms have compromised health, and above 100 ms are healthy. It varies with aging.
sdnnRange.title: SDNN
